snippet: Moazzam Begg, 46, had been held since March after being accused of aiding terrorist groups in Syria; he said he visited the country on humanitarian missions.
abstract: British prosecutors drop terrorism-related charges against Moazzam Begg, British citizen and former inmate at Guantanamo Bay detention center who was charged with providing money and training for terrorism in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Moazzam Begg, 46, had been held since March after being accused of aiding terrorist groups in Syria; he said he visited the country on humanitarian missions.

headline.main: Charges Dropped Against British Terrorism Suspect
